timeline.message: feat(adt): Add implementation for async APIs

timeline.bodyText:
We want to convert the item emitted by addWithResponseAsync(digitalTwinId, digitalTwin, context) into json string representation, and return it in a Mono; or return a Mono.error if the serialization fails.
So we need to use the Mono.flatMap API: https://projectreactor.io/docs/core/release/api/reactor/core/publisher/Mono.html#flatMap-java.util.function.Function-
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText:
flatMap(Function<? super T,? extends Mono<? extends R>> transformer)
Transform the item emitted by this Mono asynchronously, returning the value emitted by another Mono (possibly changing the value type).
replies.author: abhipsaMisra

timeline.bodyText:
Here we simply convert the object returned into <T>. There is no checked exception thrown, so nothing needs to be transformed into Mono.error.
So we can use the Mono.Map API: https://projectreactor.io/docs/core/release/api/reactor/core/publisher/Mono.html#map-java.util.function.Function-
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText:
map(Function<? super T,? extends R> mapper)
Transform the item emitted by this Mono by applying a synchronous function to it.
replies.author: abhipsaMisra
